title: Detox Your Place : Room by Room Remedies for Nontoxic Living
description: Paperback book. Clean and organize your way to a healthier home. Meadow Shadowhawk walks you through practices, products, and recipes to reduce the toxic load of each room of your home in this science-based, practical, fact-filled book. 5" l x 7" w x 0.5" h
